item2: Item 2. Management’s Discussion Analysis Financial Condition Results Operations CAUTIONARY STATEMENT REGARDING FORWARD-LOOKING STATEMENTS Portions report contain forward-looking statements within meaning Section 27A Securities Act 1933, amended, Section 21E Securities Exchange Act 1934, amended. All statements other than statements historical fact “forward-looking statements” purposes federal state securities laws, including, but not limited to: any projections earnings, revenue other financial items future financial position sources financing; any statements plans, strategies objectives management future operations business strategy; any statements regarding future economic conditions performance; any statements belief; any statements assumptions underlying any foregoing. Words such “estimate,” “project,” “predict,” “will,” “would,” “should,” “could,” “may,” “might,” “anticipate,” “plan,” “intend,” “believe,” “expect,” “aim,” “goal,” “target,” “objective,” "commit," "advance," “likely” similar expressions convey prospective nature events outcomes generally indicative forward-looking statements.
